title: Nine arrested in murder probe over far-right activist's death in Lyon
subhed: A parliamentary aide from the radical-left party La France Insoumise was among those arrested over the fatal beating of Quentin Deranque, a 23-year-old far-right activist.

title: France and Algeria agree to resume security cooperation
Peru's Congress impeaches interim President Jose Jeri
Paul Magnette, political scientist: 'If Trump and his friends were truly convinced of their superiority, would they spend so much time trying to divide Europeans?'
subhed: Rather than bemoan their dependence on the United States, European Union member states should defend their federal and democratic system and strive for greater autonomy, argues the president of Belgium's French-speaking Socialist Party, in this opinion piece for Le Monde.

title: Storms decimate thousands of puffins on France's Atlantic coast
subhed: Hit especially hard by recent storms, the birds have been washing ashore by the thousands along France's Atlantic coast. A rescue center in the southwest is taking in those who managed to survive conditions not seen in over a decade.
byline: By Jean Berthelot de La Glétais (Pouydesseaux (France) special correspondent)

title: In an open letter, dozens of film figures slam Berlin Film Festival 'silence' on Gaza
subhed: The statement, published on Tuesday, came after the Berlinale's jury president, German director Wim Wenders, answered a question on Gaza last week by saying: 'We cannot really enter the field of politics.' Signatories include Oscar-winning actors Javier Bardem and Tilda Swinton.

title: 'Marty Supreme,' with Timothée Chalamet: An existential and frenetic table tennis journey
subhed: Director and screenwriter Josh Safdie, now working apart from his brother Benny, gives the 'Dune' star the standout role of his career as a brash table tennis player inspired by Marty Reisman.

The Epstein case: Thirty years of judicial negligence, at the expense of victims
subhed: The first complaints against the millionaire date back to 1996. Yet between his initial conviction in 2008 and his arrest in the summer of 2019, he was never troubled by the justice system.

title: French music festivals to book for late winter and early spring
subhed: Electronic music, rock, chanson française, hip-hop... From Paris to Marseille, via Saint-Malo or Caen, the French festival scene offers an abundance of options sure to satisfy every musical taste.
byline: By Stéphanie Binet, Franck Colombani, Stéphane Davet, Romain Geoffroy and Pierre Gervasoni

title: In substance, Rubio's message in Munich was the same as Vance's
subhed: While the US secretary of state struck a less aggressive tone toward Europe than the American vice president had a year earlier, the substance of the speech changed little.

title: Rejecting political violence
'Cancer is a political issue because public authorities have the power to prevent it, yet fail to do so'
'Donald Trump floods the political and media landscape, even in France, where domestic issues suddenly seem trivial'
